about_the_game:
How often do you really move during the day?

Active 2048 Body Control is a fresh, innovative take on the classic 2048 puzzle, transforming your body into the joystick—no special equipment needed, just a regular webcam!

Hold the circle with both hands. The camera will adapt to your movements:

EASY or HARD

You control the game by leaning, squatting, and shifting your body. No buttons, no controllers—YOU are the joystick. Adjust the difficulty by changing your distance from the camera:

It’s more than just a game; it’s a subtle way to stay active. Best of all, you’ll forget you’re even moving as you get immersed in the addictive gameplay.

You can switch between the camera view and the stickman view.

Features:

  • Full-body control using simple, natural movements—no extra gear required.

  • Engage in organic movement that makes fitness feel like fun.

  • Quick and easy setup with a regular webcam—get started in minutes!

  • Combine mental strategy with physical movement in this exciting twist on the 2048 puzzle.

  • The perfect mix of gaming and health—you’ll be moving without even realizing it!

  • AI-generated songs inspired by 2048 :-)

Move independently of the weather, gym schedule, and equipment!
